tool_description: The Temp mail API provides users with the ability to generate temporary, disposable email addresses swiftly and securely. This tool is ideal for protecting personal email accounts from spam, testing, signing up for services, and more. With various endpoints offering functionalities like email creation, inbox retrieval, and message extraction, the Temp email API ensures you have full control over your disposable emails. Its integration via RapidAPI guarantees a smooth, quick, and secure develo...
name: Temp Email
title: Temp Email

api_list.name: List Domains
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com/domains/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch Message
api_list.url: https://temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com/message/The ID of the message you want to fetch
api_list.description: Get message of the provided message ID

required_parameters.name: message_id
required_parameters.default: The ID of the message you want to fetch

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com/message/The ID of the message you want to fetch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com/message/{message_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "temp-email9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
